column1: The Pit Room////We checked their hours and were sure we'd shown up in time to get some of their much raved about bbq but upon arriving and barely in the door
column2: several voices shouted "We're out! We're done!". Â No one offered us a menu to take with us or even encouraged us to try another time. Sadly
column3: disappointed and not sure if we'll even go back. Not a very good 1st impression I'll say.
